Metadata.title: Hatyai Aesthetic Clinic with Korean-Level Standards
Metadata.description: Kimline's filler, botox, lifting, facial rejuvenation, skin drip, and laser treatments reinforce their strengths with innovative Korean-style beauty treatments. We're confident that you won't have to fly all the way to Korea to receive the same care, including authentic quality, safety, and no mixing or reducing specifications.

Home.msg01: Hatyai Aesthetic Clinic with Korean-Level Standards
Home.msg02: Progarm Filler, Botox, Face Lifting, Brightening, Skin Drip, and Laser. The Kimline reinforces its strength through K-beauty innovations. Confident you’ll experience Korean-level care without flying to Korea. Guaranteed genuine products, safe procedures, and uncompromised quality.
Home.msg09:
Every care we take is as thoughtful as choosing the best for yourself.
"Pain-free Promise"
Home.msg15: Aesthetic Clinic in Hatyai was founded from a passion for Korean-style beauty. Inspired by Korea’s culture, service, and beauty trends, our founder continually learns from top clinics in Korea to bring advanced K-Beauty technology and Korean-level care to Hatyai so you can experience true Korean beauty close to home.

Onda.msg01: Onda Pro Fat Reduction & Skin Tightening Machine
Onda.msg03: Onda Pro is a premium body-contouring technology from Italy that uses microwave energy to reduce fat, tighten skin, and smooth cellulite effectively all without surgery. It is FDA and CE Medical Europe certified, ensuring both safety and real visible results.
Onda.msg04: Using Coolwaves™ 2.45 GHz, Today, Onda Pro has become one of the most popular body-shaping technologies in South Korea. It is widely used in leading Korean aesthetic clinics for non-surgical fat reduction, skin tightening, and body contouring, offering visible results with no downtime. Inspired by Korea’s advanced beauty standards, The Kimline Clinic has introduced this innovation to Hatyai — so you can experience K-Beauty level treatments right here in Thailand.
Onda.msg06: Onda Pro features three specialized handpieces, each designed to target different skin and fat layers for maximum results
Onda.msg07: Targets deep fat layers on areas like the abdomen, thighs, and hips for precise fat reduction.
Onda.msg08: Focuses on cellulite and surface irregularities, improving skin texture and smoothness.
Onda.msg09: Designed for delicate areas such as the face, chin, neck, and upper arms to lift and tighten the skin.
Onda.msg10: These three handpieces work synergistically to reshape and firm the body from deep within - safely and effectively.
Onda.msg11: The -5°C Cooling System of Onda Pro
Onda.msg12: One of the key features that sets Onda Pro apart from conventional fat-reduction devices is its advanced cooling system capable of reaching -5°C. While the microwave energy targets and heats fat cells deep below the skin, the handpiece maintains a constant sub-zero surface temperature protecting the outer skin from heat and discomfort.
Onda.msg14: Instantly cools the skin, ensuring a comfortable treatment experience
Onda.msg15: Prevents irritation, redness, or heat sensations on the skin
Onda.msg16: Allows stronger, deeper energy delivery with maximum safety
Onda.msg17: Promotes blood circulation and leaves the skin feeling refreshed afterward
Onda.msg18: This innovative cooling mechanism ensures that every Onda Pro session is not only effective in fat reduction and skin tightening, but also remarkably comfortable offering visible results without pain or downtime.
Onda.msg19: Which Areas Can Onda Pro Treat?
Onda.msg20: Onda Pro can be performed almost anywhere with excess fat or loose skin, such as
Onda.msg31: There is no downtime can return to your daily routine right after treatment.
Onda.msg32: Who is Onda Pro suitable for?
Onda.msg33: Those with stubborn fat deposits that don't go away with exercise.
Onda.msg34: Those with uneven skin texture or cellulite.
Onda.msg35: Those who want to tighten and firm the skin after weight loss.
Onda.msg36: Postpartum mothers who wish to regain their body shape.
Onda.msg37: Anyone looking for visible results without surgery or liposuction.

Myoung.msg01: Myoung - Deep Facial Lifting with SFMS + RF Technology
Myoung.msg03: Myoung by The Kimline Clinic Hatyai is a cutting-edge skin-lifting treatment using SFMS (Super Fine Micro-Stimulation) technology that reaches the SMAS muscle layer, the same layer targeted in surgical facelifts — without surgery or pain.
Myoung.msg04: It combines RF (Radio Frequency) energy to stimulate collagen and elastin production, leaving the skin firmer, brighter, and younger-looking from the inside out.
Myoung.msg05: At The Kimline Clinic, we prioritize natural-looking results, comfort, and the use of authentic FDA-certified devices for maximum safety.
Myoung.msg18: People afraid of needles or injectables.
Myoung.msg19: Anyone wanting firmer, tighter, youthful-looking skin.
Myoung.msg20: Recommended Program by The Kimline Clinic
Myoung.msg21: For best results, do 4 sessions 1 week apart within a month. Visible lifting can be seen after the first session, with improvement continuing over time.
Myoung.msg24: Those with heart or vascular disease
Myoung.msg25: People with fever, cancer, or tumors
Myoung.msg27: Anyone with electronic implants near the face

Filler.msg03: Filler, or dermal filler, is a skin-rejuvenating treatment that helps restore volume, smooth fine lines, and enhance facial contours for a youthful, natural look all without surgery.
Filler.msg04: At The Kimline Clinic, Hatyai, we use only authentic FDA-approved fillers from leading global brands, performed by certified aesthetic doctors who specialize in facial contouring.
Filler.msg07: Ideal for treating deep lines such as smile lines, marionette lines, or under-eye hollows. Instantly smoothens the face for a fresher, younger appearance.
Filler.msg09: Perfect for reshaping facial structure including the chin, cheeks, temples, or nose. Enhances definition and facial balance naturally.
Filler.msg11: Adds volume and definition to the lips, making them look plump, hydrated, and beautifully shaped from natural Korean-style lips to defined cupid’s bow.
Filler.msg13: Reduces dark circles, hollows, and tired eyes. Brightens the under-eye area for a refreshed and youthful look.
Filler.msg16: Smooth texture, long-lasting up to 12-18 months.
Filler.msg18: Fine particles, perfect for under-eye and lip areas.
Filler.msg20: Great value for beginners, natural-looking results.
Filler.msg21: Why Choose The Kimline Clinic for Filler Treatment
Filler.msg22: 100% authentic and traceable filler products with lot verification.
Filler.msg23: Experienced doctors specializing in facial contouring and anti-aging.
Filler.msg24: Exclusive "Kimline Signature Technique" for natural, balanced results
Filler.msg25: Sterile, safe, and hygienic environment at every step.
Filler.msg26: Free pre-treatment facial analysis and consultation.
Filler.msg29: Usually 8-18 months, depending on filler type and injection area.
Filler.msg30: How can I tell if the filler is genuine?
Filler.msg31: Genuine fillers come in sealed boxes with batch numbers that can be verified with the importer.
Filler.msg32: How should I take care after filler injection?
Filler.msg33: Avoid heat, facial massage, and heavy exercise for 24 hours after the procedure.

Botox.msg01: Botox Smooth Wrinkles & Contour Your Face Naturally
Botox.msg03: Botox, or Botulinum Toxin Type A, is one of the most popular non-surgical treatments for wrinkle reduction, facial slimming, and skin lifting.
Botox.msg04: It works by temporarily relaxing targeted muscles to smooth lines and create a naturally youthful, refreshed appearance.
Botox.msg05: At The Kimline Clinic, Hatyai, we use only authentic, FDA-approved Botox brands, injected by certified doctors using our unique “Kimline Signature Technique” for natural, precise, and long-lasting results.
Botox.msg08: Smooths fine lines and wrinkles on the forehead, frown lines, and crow's feet. Leaves your skin looking younger and refreshed.
Botox.msg10: Reduces jawline muscle size for a smaller, V-shaped face no surgery needed.
Botox.msg12: Targets the jawline and lower face to lift and tighten sagging skin for a sharper contour.
Botox.msg14: Reduces excessive sweating on the underarms, palms, or feet for long-lasting freshness.
Botox.msg17: Premium US Botox with precise, long-lasting results (4-6 months).
Botox.msg19: High-quality Korean Botox, FDA-approved, natural-looking results.
Botox.msg21: Affordable and effective, smooth diffusion, quick visible effects.
Botox.msg22: Why Choose The Kimline Clinic for Botox
Botox.msg23: 100% authentic Botox verified by import documentation.
Botox.msg24: Performed by skilled doctors specializing in facial contouring.
Botox.msg25: Exclusive Kimline Signature Technique ensures natural, non-frozen results.
Botox.msg26: Free consultation and facial analysis before treatment.
Botox.msg27: Clean, modern, and safe clinic environment certified to medical standards.
Botox.msg30: Results typically last 4-6 months, depending on the brand and area treated.
Botox.msg31: What should I avoid after Botox?
Botox.msg32: Avoid lying down for 4 hours and refrain from facial massage or intense exercise within 24 hours.
Botox.msg33: How can I tell if Botox is genuine?
Botox.msg34: Check for sealed packaging with verifiable batch numbers from official importers.

ThreadLifting.msg01: Thread Lift  Non-Surgical Face Lifting for Firm & Youthful Skin
ThreadLifting.msg03: A Thread Lift is a minimally invasive treatment that uses medical-grade dissolvable threads (PDO / PLLA / PCL) inserted beneath the skin to lift sagging areas and stimulate collagen production for firmer, younger-looking skin.
ThreadLifting.msg04: At The Kimline Clinic, Hatyai, we use only authentic, Thai FDA-approved threads, applied with our exclusive Kimline Signature Lift Technique for safe, natural, and beautiful results.
ThreadLifting.msg07: The most popular type of thread for lifting and tightening the skin. It effectively stimulates collagen production and provides visible lifting results quickly.
ThreadLifting.msg09: Helps stimulate long-term collagen regeneration, improving skin elasticity and smoothness over time.
ThreadLifting.msg11: The latest generation of lifting threads that last 18–24 months, delivering firmer, tighter, and more youthful-looking skin.
ThreadLifting.msg18: Why Choose Thread Lift at The Kimline Clinic
ThreadLifting.msg20: Performed by experienced facial contouring doctors.
ThreadLifting.msg25: Visible lifting immediately after the procedure, with continuous improvement for 2-4 weeks. Results typically last 12–24 months, depending on thread type and skin condition.
ThreadLifting.msg27: Avoid facial massage or any strong facial treatments for 1 week.
ThreadLifting.msg28: Refrain from heavy exercise and exposure to excessive heat for 3-5 days.
ThreadLifting.msg29: Visit your doctor for a follow-up appointment as scheduled.

Booster.msg01: Skin Booster Glass Skin Glow from Within
Booster.msg03: A Skin Booster is a rejuvenating treatment that delivers essential nutrients directly into the skin to restore moisture, elasticity, and radiance.
Booster.msg04: At The Kimline Clinic Hatyai, we offer genuine, FDA-approved Skin Boosters from Korea and Europe customized by experienced doctors to give you glowing, youthful skin from within.
Booster.msg07: Detoxifies and balances the skin, restoring natural brightness and vitality. Ideal for tired or dull skin.
Booster.msg09: Salmon DNA extract that repairs damaged skin cells, improves texture, and enhances elasticity for a youthful glow.
Booster.msg11: Combines Hyaluronic Acid and PLLA to smooth fine lines, boost collagen, and plump the skin naturally.
Booster.msg12: Glass Skin Program (Exclusive at The Kimline Clinic)
Booster.msg13: A special combination of boosters designed to create clear, luminous "glass skin" with deep hydration and radiance.
Booster.msg15: Those with dry, dehydrated, or dull skin.
Booster.msg16: People who want radiant, bouncy, and healthy-looking skin.
Booster.msg17: Anyone looking to revitalize their skin before makeup or laser treatments.
Booster.msg18: Those who desire the "Glass Skin" Korean-style glow.
Booster.msg19: Why Choose The Kimline Clinic for Skin Booster Treatments
Booster.msg20: We use 100% authentic, imported products approved by the Thai FDA.
Booster.msg21: All procedures are performed by experienced aesthetic doctors specializing in skin rejuvenation.
Booster.msg22: Exclusive "Kimline Signature Glow Technique" gentle, even injection across the entire face.
Booster.msg23: Visible results from the very first session smoother, plumper, and more radiant skin.
Booster.msg24: Clean, safe, and certified clinic environment with international hygiene standards.
Booster.msg27: Reduced fine lines and tighter pores.
Booster.msg28: Softer texture and better makeup adherence.
Booster.msg29: Noticeable glow from the first session.

DripTreatment.msg01: Vitamin Drip & Skin Treatment Revitalize Your Health and Skin from Within
DripTreatment.msg03: Vitamin Drip & Treatment is a wellness and beauty therapy that delivers essential vitamins, antioxidants, and nutrients directly into your body to restore energy, brighten skin, and improve overall health.
DripTreatment.msg04: At The Kimline Clinic Hat Yai, we offer a wide range of customized drips and facial treatments designed by aesthetic doctors to target your specific needs — whether it's glowing skin, detox, or energy boost.
DripTreatment.msg07: Brightens dull skin, enhances clarity, and deeply hydrates.
DripTreatment.msg09: Removes toxins, improves liver function, and boosts immunity.
DripTreatment.msg11: Restores tired skin and replenishes hydration for a healthy glow.
DripTreatment.msg13: Strengthens your body with vitamin C and essential nutrients.
DripTreatment.msg16: Deep cleansing and hydration for luminous skin.
DripTreatment.msg18: Stimulates collagen, reduces fine lines, and firms the skin.
DripTreatment.msg20: Targets acne and oil control for smooth, clear skin.
DripTreatment.msg22: Achieve radiant, Korean-style glass skin glow.
DripTreatment.msg24: Those who want to rejuvenate their skin and body from within.
DripTreatment.msg25: People with dull or tired skin due to stress or lack of rest.
DripTreatment.msg26: Anyone preparing for events or wanting natural, radiant skin.
DripTreatment.msg27: Suitable for both men and women.
DripTreatment.msg29: Uses authentic, Thai FDA-approved vitamins and formulas.
DripTreatment.msg30: Supervised by experienced doctors in skin and wellness care.
DripTreatment.msg31: Exclusive Kimline Signature Drip & Glow Technique.
DripTreatment.msg33: Immediate results refreshed, glowing, and healthy skin.

VShapedFace.msg01: Face Lifting Natural V-Shape & Firm Skin
VShapedFace.msg03: Face Lifting combines advanced technology and aesthetic techniques to lift, tighten, and contour the face without surgery.
VShapedFace.msg04: At The Kimline Clinic Hat Yai, we use the latest Ultraformer MPT and Fat Dissolve injections, enhanced with our exclusive Kimline Signature Lift Technique, to create natural, long-lasting results tailored to your facial structure.
VShapedFace.msg07: A new-generation HIFU technology that targets the SMAS layer the same layer lifted in surgical facelifts. Instantly tightens sagging skin, defines the jawline, and reduces double chin with no downtime.
VShapedFace.msg09: Reduces localized fat deposits on the cheeks, chin, and jawline. Helps achieve a naturally slimmer face without surgery.
VShapedFace.msg11: Those with sagging skin or undefined facial contours.
VShapedFace.msg12: People with excess fat on the cheeks or double chin.
VShapedFace.msg13: Anyone wanting a V-shaped face without surgery.
VShapedFace.msg14: Those who want firmer, younger-looking skin.
VShapedFace.msg16: Genuine Ultraformer MPT device certified to global standards.
VShapedFace.msg17: Experienced doctors specializing in facial contouring.
VShapedFace.msg18: Exclusive Kimline Signature Lift Technique for safe, natural-looking results.
VShapedFace.msg19: Visible improvement from the first treatment.
VShapedFace.msg20: Clean, safe, and modern clinical environment.
VShapedFace.msg23: Reduced double chin and sagging skin.
VShapedFace.msg25: Long-lasting results (6-12 months depending on skin condition)

HairRemoval.msg01: Hair Removal Smooth, Hair-Free Skin with Diode Laser Technology
HairRemoval.msg02: What is Diode Laser Hair Removal?
HairRemoval.msg03: Diode Laser Hair Removal is an advanced laser technology that targets hair follicles directly, effectively removing unwanted hair without damaging surrounding skin. It provides long-term reduction, smaller pores, and smoother, softer skin.
HairRemoval.msg04: At The Kimline Clinic Hat Yai, we use authentic, medical-grade Diode Laser systems performed by experienced specialists to ensure safe and visible results for every skin type.
HairRemoval.msg12: Benefits of Diode Laser Hair Removal.
HairRemoval.msg13: Visible results from the first session.
HairRemoval.msg16: Safe for all skin tones and body areas.
HairRemoval.msg20: Supervised by qualified doctors and laser specialists.
HairRemoval.msg21: Exclusive "Kimline Smooth Glow Technique" for gentle, effective results.
HairRemoval.msg22: Clean, private, and hygienic treatment rooms
HairRemoval.msg23: Suitable for both men and women
HairRemoval.msg25: Hair becomes finer and lighter from the very first session.
HairRemoval.msg26: New hair growth appears slower, softer, and less visible.
HairRemoval.msg27: Skin feels smooth and free from bumps or irritation.
HairRemoval.msg28: After 5-6 consecutive sessions, hair reduction becomes long-lasting and permanent.

WeightLossPen.msg01: Weight Loss Pen Safe and Effective Appetite Control & Fat Reduction
WeightLossPen.msg02: What is a Weight Loss Pen?
WeightLossPen.msg03: The Weight Loss Pen is an innovative medical treatment that helps control appetite, reduce hunger, and support healthy weight loss. It works by mimicking the body’s natural GLP-1 hormone, slowing digestion and promoting longer satiety helping you eat less and lose weight safely.
WeightLossPen.msg04: At The Kimline Clinic Hat Yai, all treatments use FDA-approved pens under the supervision of experienced aesthetic and weight management doctors, ensuring safety and personalized results.
WeightLossPen.msg05: How the Weight Loss Pen Works
WeightLossPen.msg06: Controls appetite to help you feel full faster and reduce food intake.
WeightLossPen.msg07: Slows digestion and nutrient absorption, helping maintain steady energy levels.
WeightLossPen.msg08: Balances blood sugar levels naturally and supports insulin sensitivity.
WeightLossPen.msg09: Boosts metabolism, allowing the body to burn calories more efficiently.
WeightLossPen.msg10: Ideal for individuals who struggle to lose weight due to hormonal imbalance or slow metabolism.
WeightLossPen.msg12: Individuals seeking safe, doctor-supervised weight loss.
WeightLossPen.msg13: People who tend to overeat or crave snacks frequently.
WeightLossPen.msg14: Those with excess body fat or obesity.
WeightLossPen.msg15: Anyone looking to manage blood sugar levels alongside fat reduction.
WeightLossPen.msg17: Uses authentic, Thai FDA-approved Weight Loss Pens.
WeightLossPen.msg18: Doctor-supervised program with personalized dosage adjustments.
WeightLossPen.msg19: Comprehensive BMI and health assessment before treatment.
WeightLossPen.msg20: Tailored plan for sustainable, long-term results.
WeightLossPen.msg21: Continuous follow-up to ensure safety and effectiveness.
WeightLossPen.msg24: Reduction of fat in areas like abdomen, arms, and thighs.
WeightLossPen.msg25: Improved appetite control and energy levels.

WeightLossPen.msg27: Long-lasting stable weight when done continuously in conjunction with changing eating habits
